text: "Come Said the Boy" is a 1983 song by Australian pop rock band Mondo Rock and is the leading single from their fourth studio album The Modern Bop. It went to number 2 in Australia and number 43 in New Zealand. It was banned on some radio stations at the time of its release. == Track listings == ;Aus 7" Single # "Come Said the Boy" (Eric McCusker) – 4:41 # "Gotta Get Out" (Ross Wilson) – 3:27 ;US 7" Single # "Come Said the Boy" (Eric McCusker) – 3:57 # "Cost of Living" (Eric McCusker, John James Hackett, Ross Wilson, James Black) – 4:06 ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Mondo Rock songs Category:John Farnham songs
title: Come Said the Boy
